thought: To solve this task I need to craft red_terracotta. Red_terracotta requires placing 1 red_dye surrounded by terracotta in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the terracotta from slot 39 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1
